ind.title: Cerita Pendek
ind.prompt: Write an engaging short story in English, prompted by the following keywords: [list of keywords]. Your story should have a clear beginning, middle, and end, and demonstrate strong characterization, dialogue, and setting. You have a maximum of 600 words, and can use any tense or point of view. The entire conversation and instructions should be provided in Indonesian. Feel free to be as creative and imaginative as possible.
ind.description: Tulis cerita pendek bahasa Inggris yang menarik berdasarkan kata kunci yang diberikan. Dikontribusikan oleh @LIyvqi.
ind.remark: Tulis cerita pendek menggunakan beberapa kata yang Anda berikan. Dikontribusikan oleh @LIyvqi.

metaDescription: Mempertahankan pelanggan? Strategi untuk loyalitas dan mengurangi churn!
